```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

# Necessary libraries.

library(tidyverse)

# Load in the data.

load("AJPSReplication.RData")

orig <- x

# It is called x. 

mth <- orig %>% 
  as_tibble() %>% 
  
#Mutate a new binary for ideology using case_when.
  
  mutate(ideoBinary = case_when(politicalIdeo >= 4 ~ "Conservative",
                                TRUE ~ "Liberal"))

mth
```
